AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: expected '<svg.uQuvDfx9.>' to be 'visible'

`<iframe src="https://customer-app.alia-cloudflare.com/popup?shop=comfrtclothing.myshopify.com&width=430&width=430&height=932&path=%2Fcontent%2Fkids&jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJsYXN0VXNlcklEIjoyNTIzNzEyMDksImlhdCI6MTczOTU0NjIyMn0.PKHa4fVE6oIAGrtA4f8-TeGm6QcWmOysWss0UuUYH1k" allow="clipboard-write" title="Alia popup" style="border: none; width: 100%; height: 100%;"></iframe>`
